trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> n’est pas déclenché dans certains cas, notamment lorsque l’accès à la même partie du contenu, ou lorsque le navigateur accède à un fragment de contenu sur le contenu qui est actuellement chargé (autrement dit, la valeur de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> propriété).

trans-unit.source: When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque vous naviguerez vers une ressource XAML compilée, le dernier <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> événement ne peut pas être déclenché.

trans-unit.source: This means that at the end of the download, the last reported <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> value may not equal the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Cela signifie qu’à la fin du téléchargement, le dernier signalée <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> ne peut-être pas la valeur du <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> valeur.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event to be notified when the navigation has finished.
trans-unit.target: Gérer les <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> événement pour être averti lorsque la navigation est terminée.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> déclenche <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, il déclenche également <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> événement sur le <xref:System.Windows.Application> objet.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment gérer les <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" /> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Se produit lorsque la méthode <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" /> est appelée ou lorsqu'une nouvelle navigation est demandée pendant qu'une navigation est déjà en cours.

trans-unit.source: You handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Vous gérez <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> si vous devez identifier les informations pertinentes concernant la requête de navigation lorsque le téléchargement est arrêté.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event handler, and includes:
trans-unit.target: Ces informations sont disponibles à partir de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> objet est passé à la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> Gestionnaire d’événements et inclut :

trans-unit.source: The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Objet [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] demandé.

trans-unit.source: The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: Le navigateur (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Données supplémentaires, si la navigation a été lancée en appelant <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> déclenche <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, il déclenche également <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> événement sur le <xref:System.Windows.Application> objet.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment gérer les <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: Recharge le contenu actuel.

trans-unit.source: If the current content (specified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> property) is navigated to again, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not download the content again.
trans-unit.target: Si le contenu actuel (spécifié par la valeur de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> propriété) est accédé à nouveau, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> ne télécharge pas le contenu à nouveau.

trans-unit.source: To force <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to re-navigate to the content, call <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pour forcer <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> pour accéder de nouveau au contenu, appelez <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, a new entry is not added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Notez que si le contenu actuel est accédé à nouveau, si vous en appelant <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, une nouvelle entrée n’est pas ajoutée à l’historique de navigation.

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: Supprime l'entrée de journal la plus récente de l'historique arrière.

trans-unit.source: The most recent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: L'élément <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> le plus récent dans l'historique de navigation arrière, s'il en existe un.

trans-unit.source: If two or more navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.
trans-unit.target: Si deux ou plusieurs navigateurs (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) partagent le même historique de navigation, un navigateur peut utiliser <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> pour récupérer l’entrée de l’historique de navigation arrière pour une navigation a eu lieu dans un autre navigateur.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit l'[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] du contenu actuel ou l'[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] du contenu cible de la nouvelle navigation en cours.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> qui contient l'[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] pour le contenu actuel, ou le contenu cible de la navigation en cours.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) navigates to the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Si vous définissez cette propriété sur un autre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] que celle actuellement affichée, le navigateur (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) accède à l’objet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> is set to the content that is loaded from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> est défini sur le contenu qui est chargé à partir de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] qui est accédé, à moins que la navigation est annulée.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], and can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> peut être défini avec un fragment seule [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]et peut être définie sur `null`.

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: Met fin au téléchargement de contenu pour la requête de navigation en cours.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> can be called as soon as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> peut être appelée dès que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> retourne et arrête la navigation en cours dans les frames enfants.

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event.
trans-unit.target: Appel de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> méthode déclenche le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> événement.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> doit être appelée sur le même thread que celui qui a initié le volet de navigation.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to stop loading.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment arrêter le chargement.
